feed.title: Radiology AI Implementation Lab
feed.subtitle: The Radiology AI Implementation Lab (RAIL) at the Perelman School of Medicine, led by Dr. Tessa Cook, is dedicated to advancing the real-world integration of artificial intelligence into radiology. Our work spans clinical workflow optimization, innovative medical education, and AI-driven tools to enhance patient-centered care.
